select_All_Users_No_Pass: 'SELECT id, firstName, lastName, email, level, xp FROM Users'
select_One_User_By_Id: 'SELECT id, firstName, lastName, email, xp, created_at, FROM Users WHERE id = ?'
select_One_User_By_Email: 'SELECT id, firstName, lastName, email, xp, created_at, FROM Users WHERE email = ?'
select_One_User_Level_By_ID: 'SELECT level, xp FROM Users WHERE id = ?'
select_One_User_Level_By_Email: 'SELECT level, xp FROM Users WHERE email = ?'
insert_New_User: 'INSERT INTO Users (firstName, lastName, email, password) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?)'
user_Leveling_Email: 'UPDATE Users SET xp = ?, level = ? WHERE email = ?'
user_Leveling_Id: 'UPDATE Users SET xp = ?, level = ? WHERE id = ?'
